name: Death Insurance (Updated)
description:
This game was originally made in the 3 days with my buddy Assaker and submitted in the Wowie  Jam 3.0. The theme was "Failure is Progress".

This is the build that we will update as we move forward.

You can see the original submission here at https://assaker.itch.io/death-insurance.

Game 2 of 12 for 2021.
